# Sign in

In this section you will log into the __Tercen__ platform.  

\

To Sign in:

\

* Go to https://tercen.com and click the `Sign in` link.

\

<center><img src="images/View_signin_empty.png"></center>

\

* Fill in your details:
  * Username or email
  * Password

\

<center><img src="images/View_signin_filled.png"></center>

\

* Click the `Sign in` button  

\

You will be taken to your personal Home page.

\

<img src="images/View_personal_page.png">

\

You are now signed in to __Tercen__.

\

Next... Learn to Navigate your personal home page.
